channel.title: C++ on Perl Weekly Challenge - Perl5 & Perl6

item.title: Perl Weekly Challenge - Guest Contributions
item.description: As you know, Perl Weekly Challenge, primarily focus on Perl and Raku. During the Week #018, we received the solution to “Perl Weekly Challenge - 018” by Oretis Zekai in Python. It was a pleasant surprise to receive solution in something other than Perl and Raku. Ever since regular team members also started contributing in other languages like C++ and Postscript. Please find below guest contributions. Perl Weekly Challenge - 33 1) Oretis Zekai shared solutions to Task #1 and Task #2 in Python.
